message: In case anyone is facing the same problem on Linux 14.04 or any other destro you may find this link is useful for speeding up your internet connection on Linux.
story: Mohammed Hussien shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS wired internet extremely slow
caption: askubuntu.com
description: My wired internet is running extremely slow after installing Ubuntu 14.04 on my desktop. my normal internet speed (Windows) using speedtest.net is around 25 mbps, Ubuntu is pulling in 0.5 mbps tops.
